Credit Line: The Jefferson R. Burdick Collection, Gift of Jefferson R. Burdick
Who: American Caramel Company, Lancaster  York, Pennsylvania
Description: Trade cards from the "American Caramel" baseball card series (E120), issued in 1922 in a set of 240 cards by the American Caramel Company. The set contains cards in two colors: sepia to represent American League players, and green-blue to represent players from the National League.
